scene_description_enriched: A bearded man, identified as Saint Luke by the presence of his attribute, a bull, is depicted seated and reading a large open book. He wears a halo, indicating his sainthood, and a cap. He is seated at a table with a stack of books and a cup. The scene is framed by architectural elements suggesting an interior space, with columns and arches visible. The overall impression is one of scholarly contemplation and devotion.
